components.name: TissueTreeListComponent

inputsClass.name: nodes
inputsClass.rawdescription: Input  of tissue tree list component

inputsClass.name: selected
inputsClass.rawdescription: Node selected, to view the data associated with it
inputsClass.description: Node selected, to view the data associated with it

outputsClass.name: selectedChange
outputsClass.rawdescription: Output  of tissue tree list component

propertiesClass.name: control
propertiesClass.description: tree controller, used to control the nodes in the tree
propertiesClass.rawdescription: tree controller, used to control the nodes in the tree

propertiesClass.name: dataSource
propertiesClass.description: Data source of tissue tree list component, defines the data in mat-tree
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Data source of tissue tree list component, defines the data in mat-tree

propertiesClass.name: flattener
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
new MatTreeFlattener<T, InternalNode<K, T>>(
    (node, level) => ({
      label: node.label,
      expandable: (node.children?.length ?? 0) > 0,
      level,
      data: node,
    }),
    (node) => node.level,
    (node) => node.expandable,
    (node) => node.children?.map((id) => this.nodes[id])
  )
propertiesClass.description: Flattener of tissue tree list component, returns flat-data structure
propertiesClass.rawdescription: Flattener of tissue tree list component, returns flat-data structure

methodsClass.name: hasChild
methodsClass.rawdescription: check if the current node has children
methodsClass.description: check if the current node has children

jsdoctags.comment: boolean, which means if node has children

methodsClass.description: Resets selection and collapes all nodes of the tree.

methodsClass.name: selectNode
methodsClass.rawdescription: It selects the node, which is clicked.
methodsClass.description: It selects the node, which is clicked.
